column2: his Court will now consider the provisions of the National Transport Commission Act

column1: No. 37 of 1991. In the said Act, section 24 stipulates as follows:

column2: Commission  may  having  regard  to  the  demand  for  omnibus  services  by  the
public, on the route or routes applied for in the application, either grant or if it
is satisfied that the grant of such, permit would result in the over allocation of
omnibus capacity on the route applied for refuse to grant a passenger service
